Title: Counter-intelligence of the SBU exposed attempts by the Russian Federation to obtain data on the def...
Description: About informs Security Service of Ukraine. The enemy agent turned out to be a local IT specialist who worked for a staff member of the Main Directorate of the General Staff of the Russian Armed Forces (better known as Gru). On the instructions of the occupier, the suspect set up an -observation post- in his own apartment to covertly monitor the locations of the Defense Forces. To do this, the informant purchased and installed tactical binoculars with a high magnification, a rangefinder grid and a compass in the apartment of a multi-story building. With the help of specialized optics, the person involved hoped to detect the positions of air defense and Ukrainian artillery, in particular HIMARS rocket artillery systems. The attacker also tracked the routes of military convoys and the location of Defense Forces fortifications. He transmitted the information he received to his Russian curator through an anonymous chat in the messenger. According to the informant's coordinates, the occupiers planned to carry out a new series of missile and drone strikes on the front-line territory of the region. The security service exposed the enemy henchman early and detained him in his own apartment. Prior to that, comprehensive measures were taken to secure the locations of Ukrainian troops. During searches of the detainee's premises, optics and a mobile phone, which he used in his criminal activities, were seized. -Investigators of the Security Service informed him of the suspicion under Part 2 of Art. 114-2 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (unauthorized dissemination of information about the movement, movement or location of the Armed Forces with the possibility of their identification in the locality with the purpose of providing such information to the state that is carrying out armed aggression against Ukraine),- the message says. The perpetrator is in custody. He faces up to 8 years in prison. The special operation was carried out by SBU employees in the Zaporizhzhia region under the procedural guidance of the regional prosecutor's office. As reported by ArmyInform, life imprisonment threatens the spy who gave away the positions of the Ukrainian artillery.

Title: Creation of technical requirements for turnstiles according to NATO standards: a new development of ...
Description: It is about this informs September 12. -Within the limits of this process, the Department of Health of the Ministry of Defense (DOH) focused on the established requirements for tourniquets of the rotary and lever type, occlusive thoracic bandages, as well as methodologies for assessing their compliance with international standards,- the report says. To implement this task, the Ministry of Defense actively cooperates with international partners, in particular with the NATO Combat Trauma Committee (CoTCCC). The DOZ is studying the best practices of NATO member countries, initiating requests to the defense attaché at Ukrainian embassies regarding the quality standards of hemostatic tourniquets. On the basis of the received data, the department analyzed its own capabilities for the development of technical and functional requirements for mechanical products to stop bleeding. In addition, the Ministry of Defense has applied to the NATO Science & Technology Organization to receive a grant to create a laboratory for testing and testing of tourniquets and first aid equipment. -Providing our army with modern, standardized medical equipment is at the top of our priorities. Our task is to make pre-medical care on the battlefield as effective as possible by adapting and implementing advanced international standards,- said Oksana Sukhorukova, head of the Health Department of the IOU. According to her, the development of requirements for turnstiles and their certification according to NATO standards is key to their strategy. -It's not just a procedure, it's about our commitment to providing every soldier with real-time, life-saving tools on the frontline,- she noted. Another important step was the adoption of order No. 436 dated June 29, 2024 -On approval of the Volumes of pre-medical care provided during hostilities and training of Security Forces and Defense Forces on a tactical basis.- According to it, the skill of using a tourniquet is mandatory at all levels of training in home care. The Ministry of Defense also cooperates with the Main Department of Doctrine and Training of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine on updating the training programs of servicemen. In particular, the Department proposed to make changes to the basic military training program (BZVP), which will contribute to increasing the effectiveness of the training of servicemen in the field of pre-medical care. As reported by ArmyInform, earlier the delegations of the Ministry of Defense and NATO ->discussed speeding up the promised aid to Ukraine from allies.

Title: -Your family will leave you, son-: Russia throws conscripts into battle in the Kharkiv Region
Description: This was reported by the spokesman of the operative-tactical group -Kharkiv-, Colonel Vitaly Sarantsev. The next step may be the start of a large-scale mobilization campaign in the Russian Federation. — The significant losses suffered by the enemy in the Kharkiv direction, more than ten thousand people only in our operational zone in four months, forced Russia to look for additional resources to continue the war. Russian legislation does not prohibit enlisting conscript soldiers for combat operations after they have completed four months of service, so it is possible to predict their appearance in other areas as well, he noted. According to the spokesman, this may indicate a lack of military personnel in Russian units, as a result of which the military command is forced to use less experienced soldiers for combat missions. Voyskovyi added that Russian propaganda had already warmed up society to such a development, tested its reaction, which predictably turned out to be zero, so the next steps should be expected - the start of a large-scale mobilization campaign in Russia. ArmyInform previously reported that in the Kharkiv region, Russia is fighting with poorly trained soldiers.

Title: In the South, Russians regularly gouge out their eyes
Description: On September 12, on the broadcast of the -Yedini Novyni- marathon, the spokesman of the -Tavria- OUV, Dmytro Lykhova, told about it. -It is very gratifying that the statistics of downed reconnaissance drones is increasing. Our aerial reconnaissance has learned to shoot them down with FPV drones. And this statistic of damage to intelligence is constantly growing. There were four such lesions yesterday. Also, two boats, one enemy ATV and one -Detector- communication station were destroyed,- said the spokesman of the -Tavria- OUV. According to Dmytro Lykhovy, the front line is dynamic. Most of the combat clashes take place in the Kherson direction. 7 of them were counted during yesterday's day. -And these seven assault actions were aimed at different islands on the left bank of the Dnieper, both east of Krynok and not far from Kherson. Small infantry groups using boats. There is such a specificity of the area that it is necessary to look for some special methods of logistics through the straits and estuaries, to use hydrocycles. And this entire arsenal of Russian means of transportation is being actively destroyed,- Dmytro Lykhovi concluded. As reported by ArmyInform, according to In August, the occupiers used 200 munitions with poisonous substances in the South, and in ten days of September — four dozen.

Title: The Ministry of Defense published the number of vacancies in the Armed Forces and named the most in-...
Description: About it in interview ArmiyaInform was told by Oleksiy Bezhevets, the authorized representative of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine on recruiting issues. -Plus the online database on four online job search platforms — another 10,000. Yes, the mosaic of vacancies in the Defense Forces is huge. And a high-quality search gives a great conversion: a person who applied and who is suitable for military service can actually find a good job for himself,- said Oleksiy Bezhevets. He also listed the most in-demand professions in the Defense Forces. -Every week there are spikes regarding certain positions. Yes, a large number of applications were, for example, for intelligence. There was a separate period when gunners were looking for positions. UAV operators are always relevant. There is also a demand for staff positions, clerks, and the IT field,- said Oleksiy Bezhevets. As reported by ArmyInform, opened 35th recruiting center of the Ukrainian army.

Title: Valuyte in Valuyki — Defense forces blew up a railway in Russia
Description: This was reported by ArmyTV on September 12, citing its own sources. As a result of the successful operation, which took place on September 10, 2024, a freight train was damaged that provided the logistical needs of the Russian army. Immediately, 11 wagons and the locomotive of the freight train derailed and overturned. As reported by ArmyInform, during the operation in the Black Sea, soldiers of the special unit of the GUR of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine destroyed a Russian combat aircraft Su-30SM by hitting from MANPADS.

Title: Oleksandr Serhiy: Strengthening Ukraine's defense capabilities requires active cooperation with alli...
Description: About this informs the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The First Ukrainian-Polish Forum of Defense Industries was held within the framework of the exhibition. The delegation of the Ukrainian Defense Ministry was headed by the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Oleksandr Serhiy. Its composition included specialists in separate clusters of weapons and military equipment of the Ground Forces and the Air Force. The Ukrainian delegation held a number of meetings with representatives of military departments of individual countries and world defense concerns. Within the framework of the international arms exhibition, technical discussions were held with the world's leading manufacturers of weapons and military equipment from the USA, Norway, Finland, France, Australia, Great Britain, Poland and other countries. The Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine thanked the Allies for their large-scale support in the fight against Russian aggression and informed about the urgent needs of the Defense Forces of Ukraine to strengthen their capabilities on the ground and in the air. Among the priorities are air defense systems, unmanned systems for various purposes, means of radio-electronic warfare, ammunition and individual components for their production in Ukraine. The issue of organizing the repair of foreign samples of weapons and military equipment in Ukraine was also discussed. -I heard assurances from many of our partners regarding the continued support of Ukraine in the war with Russia. According to the results of the meetings with the representatives of the defense departments, in particular, Norway and Canada, the issue of preparation and conclusion of agreements on cooperation in the field of armaments was agreed upon,- said the deputy head of the defense department at the end of the trip. According to the words of the Deputy Minister of Defense, there was a conversation about the need to intensify work to meet the needs of the Defense Forces of Ukraine, as well as regarding the implementation of important projects for the long-term support of our army. -In view of the situation on the front lines, significant volumes of weapons production at Russian military-industrial complex factories, the supply of ammunition to the Russian Federation from North Korea and Iran, the Kremlin seeks to further destroy and kill. Therefore, we need to significantly strengthen the capabilities of the Defense Forces. Russian terror must be stopped by the powerful response of the Ukrainian army and the important decisions of our allies,- Oleksandr Serhii noted. According to our allies, Russia's war against Ukraine has become the greatest challenge to modern security policy. Russia continues to wage war and threatens not only Ukraine. Consolidating the efforts of democratic countries, increasing military aid to Ukraine is crucial in view of today's threats. In order for our army to be stronger in the fight against the aggressor, we ask our allies to create joint military enterprises, as well as to buy weapons for the Armed Forces from domestic manufacturers. Every euro invested in Ukrainian -defense- enterprises is an investment in European security. As reported by ArmyInform, the delegations of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine and the USA discussed the expansion of defense cooperation.

Title: Under the white flag, two occupiers surrendered to our defenders
Description: On September 12, the State Border Service of Ukraine announced the new prisoners on September 12. One of the prisoners is from Makiivka, Donetsk region. At the time of the invasion in 2014, he lived in Crimea. He was engaged in construction and, having deceived the Russian Ministry of Defense during state procurement, was given a choice: either go to prison or go to war. Another prisoner was mobilized in 2022 during a document check on a train and sent to study in Belarus. He escaped from there, hid for a year and a half, and a month ago he was caught again and sent to storm the positions of the Ukrainian military. The prisoners were handed over to the special services to form an exchange fund. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the captured Russian soldier Arman Zhanpeysovich Shadanov in the Kursk region complains , that in the army of the Russian Federation one has to buy and obtain even food and clothes, not to mention the cost of maintaining a loaf of bread, with which they were preparing to evacuate the wounded.

Title: The delegations of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine and the USA discussed the expansion of defense...
Description: About this reported on September 12 the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. -I am glad to congratulate you on your appointment and personally in Ukraine. I am confident that our cooperation will help to structure and expand US assistance in the field of defense cooperation,- said Deputy Minister of Defense Oleksandr Balanutsa. Representatives of relevant departments of the Ministry of Defense as part of the Ukrainian delegation discussed with the American side the key details of the expansion of targeted assistance from the USA and the state of implementation of current cooperation projects. -I am in Ukraine in order to help and direct American aid in the right direction. My team is ready together with you for fruitful cooperation in order to resolve all urgent issues as soon as possible,- assured Colonel Shawn Kyle. The parties discussed specific steps to strengthen cooperation. The delegation of the Ministry of Defense received practical advice for formulating requests for receiving American assistance. As reported by ArmyInform, the USA provides Ukraine a new $700 million aid package.

Title: Enemy -Buk- under the root -cut down- in the direction of Orihiv
Description: On September 12, on the broadcast of the -Edyny Novyny- marathon the spokesman of the OUV told -Tavria- Dmytro Lykhova. In addition, added the spokesman of the -Tavria- OUV, for yesterday, the total losses of the enemy in the directions of Orichiv and Prydniprovsky amounted to 69 people. Also, 42 units of the enemy's weapons and military equipment were destroyed or damaged. -Yesterday, one Russian tank was hit in the Gulyaipil direction, which is generally calm here. There are no infantry assaults, but there are defeats to a considerable depth of the enemy's defensive formations. Three armored fighting vehicles were also damaged there. This is all in the area of ​​the village of Smile,- noted Dmytro Lykhovi. The -Buk- anti-aircraft missile complex was destroyed in the Ukrainka area in the Orihiv direction. Another anti-aircraft installation was hit in the Pokrovsky district. In addition, they liquidated 15 vehicles, four reconnaissance drones of the -wing- type of operational-tactical level. As reported ArmyInform, during an operation in the waters of the Black Sea, soldiers of the special unit of the GUR of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine destroyed a Russian Su-30SM combat aircraft with a MANPADS hit.

Title: They hit a tank, fired at the positions - the combat work of the Ironmen
Description: The video appeared on September 12 on the brigade channel. First, a group of Crazy Cats FPV drone crews from one of the rifle battalions spotted an enemy tank. It brazenly rolled onto the road and fired at our positions until it burned down after being hit by a kamikaze drone. In the second episode, the calculation of the ZU-32-2 anti-aircraft installation was aimed at enemy positions at night. It was very effective. -The combat work of the units of the Iron Brigade does not stop for a single day. Depending on the area of ​​defense and objectives, different units work, but with the sole goal of destroying as many invaders as possible,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, iron tankers gave half a minute of pleasure from the work of -Oplot-.

Title: The occupiers suffer from Ukrainian drones: the enemy is evacuating sanitary losses in the Kharkiv r...
Description: Details of the situation and enemy losses in the Kharkiv direction were reported in Kharkiv OTU. In the area of ​​the settlement Hlyboke, the enemy focused the main attention on restoring the combat capability of the units of the 11th tank regiment of the 18th motorized rifle division in advanced positions. In the vicinity of Lukyantsi, the enemy conducts engineering reconnaissance of advance routes. He also focused the main attention on countermeasures against UAVs of the Defense Forces of Ukraine. In Vovchansk, the enemy continues assault operations in the area of ​​a multi-storey building, carries out aerial reconnaissance in order to identify units of the Defense Forces of Ukraine. Conducts measures to restore the combat capability of units of the 82nd motorized rifle regiment of the 69th motorized rifle division and 4 volunteer reconnaissance and assault brigades. In the area of ​​the settlement Tikhe, the occupiers evacuated sanitary casualties from the forward positions of the 136th separate motorized rifle brigade of the 58th army. During the past day, three combat clashes took place. the Russian occupiers also carried out one airstrike using two air defense systems. 32 kamikaze drone strikes were carried out. The occupiers shelled the positions of the Defense Forces of Ukraine 440 times. The defense forces of Ukraine adequately respond to the actions and continue to destroy the manpower, weapons and military equipment of the Russian occupiers. The enemy's losses during the past day amounted to 130 lives, of which 50 were irretrievable, and 80 were sanitary. Also, in our direction the enemy lost destroyed and damaged 78 units of weapons and military equipment, in particular : Also in the Kharkiv direction, the Defense Forces destroyed 55 personnel shelters and an ammunition storage area. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that drones of the -Achilles- assault air defense battalion of the 92nd separate assault brigade named after the basket chieftain Ivan Sirk reported the statistics of destroyed and damaged enemy equipment in the Kharkiv direction.

Title: In the East, our defenders destroyed two anti-aircraft guns and three anti-aircraft guns of the occu...
Description: informs OSUV -Khortytsia- on its official Telegram channel -Khortytskyi Wind-. As noted, the Defense Forces continue to inflict losses on the enemy in manpower and equipment. In particular, in this direction, Russian losses per day are: In addition, our soldiers managed to destroy 102 shelters of the invaders. As reported by ArmyInform, within a day at the front Russian invaders lost 1,270 personnel killed and wounded.

Title: The Ministry of Defense named the regions in which women most often turn to recruiting centers
Description: About this in interview ArmiyaInform was told by Oleksiy Bezhevets, the authorized representative of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine on recruiting issues. Yes, the correspondent asked whether women apply to recruiting centers and what positions they are looking for. To this Oleksiy Bezhevets answered as follows: -They are applying, and quite a few. In the Sumy region, for example, a third of the candidates with whom job selection is being conducted are from women. Every third appeal is from a woman. And the potential is simply huge,- – says the Commissioner. He emphasized that a woman in the army is -not necessarily only a cook, a clerk, a lawyer or a journalist.- -Actually, there are no legal restrictions. A woman can also obtain professional training for almost any position in the army and perform her duties. A large number of units are very loyal and recruit women. Moreover, for various positions: snipers, UAV operators, medics.- Also, according to him, the Chernihiv region is the leading region in terms of the number of appeals by women to recruiting centers. ArmyInform talked about the military servicewoman Leyla, who worked in IT, and now komandyra-vzvodu-bpla/->leads the UAV platoon.

Title: Rescuers showed the rescue of an elderly woman from the rubble in the Kharkiv region
Description: notified about this by the State Emergency Service of Ukraine. This morning, the enemy made an insidious attack on a two-story residential building in the village of Borova, Izyum district. The explosion destroyed the central part of the building, and a fire broke out. During emergency rescue operations, emergency workers rescued a woman who was crushed by the debris of construction structures. She is currently in the hospital. Rescue workers from Kharkiv Oblast, Luhansk Oblast and Khmelnytsky Oblast are involved in the work , as well as a medical calculation from Zhytomyr region. As reported by ArmyInform, the Russians dropped a corrected aerial bomb on Kup Yansk, an unmanned aerial vehicle struck the village of Zolochiv.

Title: Raids on occupied shores: the Swedish analogue of the Cossack -seagull- will help
Description: On September 12, on the broadcast of the -Edyny Novyny- marathon the spokesman of the Naval Academy told Captain Third Rank Dmytro Pletenchuk and shared some details about the Combat Boat 90. -If you want to look at the comparison with the Russian Navy, copying this boat, they made the Raptor. This is the original, unlike the fake that they directly use. Armored boat, which is intended for landing landings on the coast. It allows to protect the personnel and small arms, debris and similar factors that directly affect the exit from the amphibious landing to the coast,- said the spokesperson of the Ukrainian Navy. According to Pletenchuk, given that amphibious operations are one of the functions of the marine corps, such units can always be useful for the marines. Wherever such vessels are used - both on rivers and at sea. Previously ArmyInform told the story of Marine Fartovoy, who fought for 72 days in Krynkah.

Title: Kharkiv Oblast was shelled by air defense systems, UAVs and anti-aircraft missiles: a woman was inju...
Description: informed about the consequences of enemy shelling of Kharkiv Oblast Oleg Synegubov. In Kupyansk, as a result of enemy shelling, a shop was completely destroyed, in Zolochev a private house, farm buildings and gas networks were damaged. The occupiers also shelled Borova of the Izyum district, where structural elements of a destroyed 2-story residential building burned as a result of the shelling. The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informed about the consequences of the shelling of Borova. A two-story apartment building was hit. An 86-year-old woman was buried under the rubble. The rescuers unblocked the victim, she was hospitalized with injuries. Adjacent houses were also damaged. According to preliminary data, the occupiers fired at Borova with Tornado-S rocket launchers. Outside the villages Berezhivka and Kalynove of the Zolochiv community of the Bogodukhiv district, there were no casualties. The Main Department of the State Emergency Service of Ukraine in the Kharkiv region reported about a large-scale fire in the ecosystem in the area of ​​the village Cherkasky Tyshki of Tsirkuniv community of Kharkiv district. The flames covered an area of ​​20 hectares, the fire spread to the village. -6 private economic structures, 3 units of civil engineering, as well as a residential building and 2 farm buildings in the village of Cherkassy Tyshki in Kharkiv Oblast, which were previously destroyed by enemy shelling, were burned,- the message reads. 70 rescuers, 11 departments of the State Emergency Service on tankers, as well as 4 units of auxiliary equipment worked at the scene. The cause of the fire is being investigated. Also, the Main Department of the State Emergency Service of Ukraine in the Kharkiv region informed that a large-scale forest fire was extinguished on September 11 near the village of Studenok of the Oskyl community, which destroyed more than 230 houses and other buildings, damaged 1,620 hectares of forest, and injured 7 people only in the territory of Kharkiv region. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that occupiers attacked Zaporizhzhia, during the day, the Russians struck 337 strikes, the infrastructure was damaged.

Title: It is impossible to restore: the occupiers left the residents of Pokrovsk without water
Description: This was reported by the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. He noted that work is currently underway to resolve this issue. In particular, 75 wells for public use have already been drilled at the expense of the local budget in the Pokrovsk community, and 250 wells near high-rise buildings at the expense of condominiums. The community has organized potable water delivery and installed 8 reverse osmosis units, from which people can collect water for free. At the same time, water supply continues in Rodinsky. -The situation is difficult and will not get better in the near future,- Vadym Filashkin emphasized. As reported by ArmyInform, two people were killed and two were injured as a result of the shelling of Konstantinopol of the Velikonovosilkiv community in Donetsk region.

Title: Large-scale attack by enemy drones: 44 UAVs destroyed, 4 more remain in the air
Description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The occupiers hit Chernihiv region with two Iskander-M ballistic missiles from the Kursk region. and one Kh-59/69 guided air missile from the Bryansk region, two Kh-22/32 cruise missiles from Tu-22M3 aircraft (from the airspace over the Black Sea in the direction of the Snake Island). Also, the enemy attacked with 64 attack UAVs of the Shahed type (launch areas: Kursk, Yeisk - Russia, Chauda - Crimea). The air attack of the enemy was repelled by aviation, anti-aircraft missile troops, mobile fire groups and units of the Defense Forces of Ukraine. As a result of the anti-aircraft battle, 44 attack UAVs were shot down. Three enemy drones flew back to Russia, four more were lost in location on the territory of Ukraine (information about casualties and destruction was not received). As of 9:00 a.m., four attack UAVs remain in the airspace of Ukraine, combat work is underway! Due to the active countermeasures of the Defense Forces, most of the enemy missiles did not reach their intended targets. Air defense worked in Kyiv, Kherson, Khmelnytskyi, Cherkasy, Sumy, Dnipropetrovsk, Kirovohrad, Zaporizhzhya and Poltava regions. As reported by ArmyInform, our arta damaged two important objects objects of the Russian invaders.

Title: Among the 11 victims of the Russian attacks in the Kherson region is a child
Description: This was reported by Oleksandr Prokudin, head of Kherson OVA. Antonivka, Prydniprovske, Kizomys, Sadove, Veletenske, Bilozerka, Tokarivka, Mykhailivka, Olhivka, Novovorontsovka came under enemy fire and airstrikes last day. The following settlements were also affected by Russian strikes: Lviv, Odradokamyanka, Mykolaivka, Burgunka, Trudolyubivka, Dovhovo, Nova Kuban, Zarichne, Osokorivka, Chervyn Mayak, Olhyne, Kozatske and the city of Kherson. In addition, the Russian military targeted the Point of Invincibility, residential quarters of populated areas of the region, including 11 private houses. The occupiers also damaged private cars. The head of the OVA noted that during the night drone attack, the Air Defense Forces destroyed 4 Shahed-131/136 over the territory of the region. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day occupiers 337 times 11 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region were beaten.

Title: It didn't help. Prince drones destroyed an enemy mortar, which was disguised as a garbage can
Description: The video of the combat work was released on September 12 on the brigade channel. -One, two, three! Mortar mountains! That is how, instantly, the air reconnaissance units of the Princely Brigade and the Haron strike group worked. Just a moment — and the enemy mortar from BC burst into flames and turned into scrap metal!-, the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the drones of the princely brigade burned the Russian RSZV right on fire.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Our artillery damaged two important objects of the Russian invaders
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. However, our soldiers continue to actively inflict significant losses in equipment and manpower on the occupying troops, exhaust the offensive potential of the enemy along the entire front line and in the rear. Over the past 24 hours, aviation and missile forces and artillery of the Defense Forces have carried out 32 strikes on the areas of concentration of personnel and anti-aircraft defenses, hit six air defense systems, three guns in firing positions, one electronic warfare station, two remote minefields and two other important objects of Russian invaders As reported by ArmiyaInform, the army of the Russian Federation stormed the positions of our defenders more than 100 times: the situation remains tense. We will remind, last day the losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 1270 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 11 tanks, 17 armored combat vehicles, 73 artillery systems, two anti-aircraft guns, two air defense systems, one plane, 43 operational-tactical UAVs, 93 vehicles and two units of special equipment.

Title: The GUR showed the destruction of the Russian Su-30SM aircraft for 50 million dollars
Description: About this informs Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. It is noted that the fighter that fell into the sea belonged to the 43rd separate naval aviation regiment of the Russian Armed Forces, which is based at the airfield of the city of Saka in the temporarily occupied Crimea. -The occupiers lost contact with their battleship on September 11, 2024 at around 5 am. Approximately three hours later, the Russians launched a search and rescue operation with the involvement of the An-26 aircraft, as well as Mi-8 and Ka-27 helicopters,- the report said. At lunchtime, the invaders reported to the command about a characteristic spot from aviation fuel discovered in the sea, 70 kilometers northwest of Cape Tarkhankut, and soon they also saw the wreckage of the destroyed Su-30SM. The department noted that the cost of such an aircraft is approximately 50 million dollars.

Title: The Russian army stormed the positions of our defenders more than 100 times: the situation remains t...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The aggressor carried out airstrikes, in particular in the areas of the settlements of Ivashchenkove, Volodymyrivka, Bila Bereza, Vilna Sloboda, Kindrativka, Yastrubyne, Smolyne of the Sumy region; Semenivka, Mykolaivka, Chernihiv region; Kupyansk, Kharkiv region. Shcherbynivka, Oleksandropil, Ozaryanivka, Druzhba, Chasiv Yar, Mykolaivka, Shchurove, Kostyantynivka, Vugledar, Urozhaine, Rozhivka, Velyka Novosilka, Blagodatne of the Donetsk region also came under enemy fire; Biloghirya, Zaporizhzhia region. In the Kharkiv direction the enemy continued its assault. Here, three combat clashes took place in the districts of Gatyshch, Lyptsi and Tykhoi. 16 enemy attacks were recorded in the Kupyan direction. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Lozova, Sinkivka, Hlushkivka, Stelmakhivka, and Andriivka. On the Lymansky direction our troops repelled 11 assaults by the occupiers in the districts of Makiivka, Nevsky, Terniv, Grekivka, Druzhelyubivka, and Teverdokhlibovo and Dibrova. In the Northern direction Defense forces repelled one attack near Vyimka. In the Toretsk direction, the enemy, supported by aviation, launched six attacks. He concentrated his efforts in the regions of Toretsk, Nelipivka and Dachne settlements. In the Pokrovsky direction our defenders repelled 30 attacks. The main efforts of the enemy were concentrated in the districts of Vozdvizheneka, Zeleny Polya, Novooleksandrivka, Grodivka, Novotroitsky, Novogrodivka, Selidovoy, and Mykhailivka. In the Kurakhiv direction Defense forces continue to hold back the enemy in the Kostyantynivka, Ukrainian and Georgiivka districts. In total, the enemy tried to break through the defense of our troops in this direction 23 times. On the Vremiv direction, the occupiers launched four attacks on our positions in the direction of Vugledar. The opponent had no success. On the Orihiv direction, two skirmishes took place near Malaya Tokmachka, which were unsuccessful for the enemy. No losses of positions and territories were allowed in the Dnieper direction. Ukrainian soldiers successfully repelled seven attacks by Russian invaders. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. Operational situation without significant changes. We will remind, last day the losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 1270 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 11 tanks, 17 armored combat vehicles, 73 artillery systems, two anti-aircraft guns, two air defense vehicles, one plane, 43 operational-tactical UAVs, 93 vehicles and two units of special equipment.

According to preliminary information, the enemy lost 108 soldiers killed and wounded, and Ukrainian servicemen destroyed two armored vehicles, two artillery systems, four units of automotive and two units of special equipment. In addition, six artillery systems, one armored combat vehicle and six enemy vehicles were damaged. In the Kupyansk direction Defense forces repelled 16 enemy attacks in the Lozova, Sinkivka, Hlushkivka, Stelmakhivka area and Andriyivka, three clashes are still ongoing, the situation is under control. Title: In the Kherson region, the unusual boats of the occupiers were destroyed for the first time

Title: The head of the Russian Ministry of Foreign Affairs lied again: about what this time
Description: This happened after participation in the Strategic Dialogue between the Russian Federation and the Cooperation Council of the Arab States of the Persian Gulf.
